name: Bob The Website Builder
tagline: Web design as the cornerstone of your e-home.
description:
I am Bob The Website Builder where I provide small business website design solutions that are customized, optimized, and strategized as the cornerstone of your complete online presence.
In other words, not only do I aim to provide a website that properly reflects you and your value that speaks to your target market, but I also help build other importance pieces of a complete online presence – such as local google maps, social media profiles, and other industry specific directory listings – all in the interest of helping you be liked by google and found by your target market.
It is my goal and passion to help the new and small business owner to get online quickly, completely, and most importantly - affordably.
Please visit www.BTWSB.net <http://www.BTWSB.net>  for more information.
